text: Soldier: Hey kid! Whatcha doing here?
Soldier: Weapon for adventurer eh? Well i might have or two.
Soldier: But before i can give it to you, I need conduct throughfull and sophisticated psyko... syco... psylo...
Soldier: I will ask you 3 questions. If you answer all of them correcty, you can have my wooden sword. Ready?
Soldier: Wery well then, question number one: What is the capital city of England?
Soldier: Sorry kid, but that is wrong... maybe next time?
Slodier: Correct! What is the atomic number of Xenon?
Slodier: Well... honestly, I don't know. So let's say correct and move to next one.
Slodier: What is the airspeed velocity of unloaden swallow?
Slodier: Wait! Hold on... do you want to kill me?
Soldier: Agh, just take this junk and away, before i change my mind!.
Solder: ... Correct? Well, i guess you win. Here is your price: The mighty Wooden sword!
